attributes.action: British law should apply to foreign drivers on UK roads.
attributes.additional_details:
Myself and family were involved in a motorway accident. We were hit from behind whilst waiting in a traffic queue. The car is a total write off.

We were hit by a foreign driver and as such he has got away with dangerous driving. If we had been hit by an English driver they would have been charged so why not a Foreign driver?

We were lucky and came out of the accident with only minor, but very painful injuries. Someone else may not be so lucky.

Yet there was no charge, no fine, no points, no ban, nothing!! Why should foreign drivers be above UK law??
